mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.order_ as 'order', t.type as type, t.org_name as orgName, t.org_code as orgCode, t.overall_satisfaction as overallSatisfaction, t.storming as storming, t.stationary_phase as stationaryPhase, t.old_proprietor as oldProprietor, t.order_service_unit as orderServiceUnit, t.esu_cleaning as esuCleaning, t.esu_green as esuGreen, t.engineering_service_unit as engineeringServiceUnit, t.create_time as createTime, t.create_by as createBy, t.update_by as updateBy, t.update_time as updateTime, t.remark as remark, t.effective_time as effectiveTime FROM t_satisfaction t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(effective_time, '%Y-%m') = #{time} AND org_code = #{orgCode}
